content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I used the "google" command to search for "Brno Reservoir Trail hiking"
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='your computer', content='Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: Error: No text to summarize\n\nLinks: []', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "python3 brno_reservoir_trail.py"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:\nb\'\'\nSTDERR:\nb"python3: can\'t open file \'/home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/brno_reservoir_trail.py\': [Errno 2] No such file or directory\\n"', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "write_to_file", "args": {"filename": "brno_reservoir_trail.py", "text": "#!/usr/bin/env python\\n\\nimport requests\\nfrom bs4 import BeautifulSoup\\n\\nurl = \'https://www.alltrails.com/trail/czech-republic/south-moravian/stezka-brnenska-prehrada\'\\n\\nresponse = requests.get(url)\\nsoup = BeautifulSoup(response.text, \'html.parser\')\\n\\ntrail_distance = soup.find(\'span\', {\'class\': \'detail-data\'}).text\\ntrail_difficulty = soup.find(\'span\', {\'class\': \'detail-data\'}).find_next_sibling(\'span\').text\\n\\nprint(\'Distance: \' + trail_distance)\\nprint(\'Difficulty: \' + trail_difficulty)\\n"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command write_to_file returned: File written to successfully.', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_python_file", "args": {"filename": "brno_reservoir_trail.py"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command execute_python_file returned: Error: Traceback (most recent call last):\n  File "/home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/brno_reservoir_trail.py", line 11, in <module>\n    trail_distance = soup.find(\'span\', {\'class\': \'detail-data\'}).text\nAttributeError: \'NoneType\' object has no attribute \'text\'\n', type='action_result')]
"""
